title.narrative: Rural Development: Smallholder Agriculture Development Project

description.narrative: The project''s development objective is to increase marketed output among project beneficiaries in Lesotho''s smallholder agriculture sector. Two major project outcomes are expected that would lead to achieving the Project Development Objective: (a) agricultural market opportunities in the project area increased; and (b) productivity and output of smallholder farming activities in the project area increased.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Smallholder Agriculture Development Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
